review:
My recent experience with the Physician Dr. Srinath A (MBBS, CCT - Endocrinology and Diabetes Mellitus, MRCP (UK), MD - General Medicine),
was delightful and rewarding.  He took time to listen to my health problems
and suggested lab tests to evaluate my health situation.  ** *** **** ************* ** ********* ** ****** ********  I would strongly recommend  him to anyone looking for diabetic and thyroid problems.
Nagmani Rangaswamy Ph.D

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Have taken an appointment for my mother who has type 2 diabetes for almost 12 years. She has been taking insulin and other medicines like janumet, vobligose for last 5-6 years. We came across this centre through a friend and attended Dr Srinath consult. His treatment plan, approach to diabetes management was very different. He helped us use this technology of continuous monitoring of sugar and told my mother what js affecting her levels. The centre provides support for all diabetes management. My mother sugar has come from 300 to 110 in fasting, and medicine also gone down. Appreciate the treatment of doctor and his team.
The doctor just gave 5 minutes and sent to next doctor further issues and changed the same medicine with different companies

Had met him once and was asked to get scanning done at some known place of Dr Srinatha and wanted to get back to him post scanning to show the reports but to reach him at his clinic from past a week has become a big headache as staff in his clinic doesn't know where he is and what time he comes to clinic. I had to come from yelahanka to meet doc. Because of referral we landed here. so plz avoid this doc *** *** * ****** ****************
